EmailTemplate.name: No PMA
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Please note you will need to procure the requested part(s) directly from the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) as we do NOT have Part Manufacturing Approval (PMA) on this part.
<Insert body of message here>
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
